details.arabic_diacless: سبحانك اللٰهم وبحمدك، وتبارك اسمك، وتعالى جدك، ولا إلٰه غيرك
details.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللّٰهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلَا إِلٰهَ غَيْرُكَ
details.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma wa bihamdika, wa tabaarakasmuka, wa ta'aalaa jadduka, wa laa 'ilaaha ghayruka.
details.translations: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 775, Ibn Majah 806, An-Nasa'I 899, At-Tirmithi 283. See Al-Albani, Sahih At-Tirmithi 1/77 and Sahih Ibn Majah 1/135.

pageTitle: At the start of the prayer #2
